thread.title: Ready for cold weather? Steps to save money, save energy, and stay warm
thread.title_full: Ready for cold weather? Steps to save money, save energy, and stay warm

title: Ready for cold weather? Steps to save money, save energy, and stay warm
text: As Minnesota’s weather turns cold, homeowners and renters can take steps now to save money, save energy and stay warm. The Minnesota Department of Commerce offers resources through the Energy Information Office and energy programs, including its Guides for Home Weatherization and Energy Efficiency. kAm(C2A J@FC 9@>6 :?
